creator: belial
description:
{RHelp Topic{W: Aludra{x

Aludra is the Goddess of Life. She works closely with Nephium to make sure
that the circle of life is continuous. Her worshippers specialties are
resurrection and healing spells, with a variety of protection spells.
Aludra's followers are your run of the mill cleric types. She does not
detest death as she realizes this is a necessity for life, but she would
prefer to see a life saved rather than lost. She is rather good natured and
slow to anger, she does however detest Sirian. She also thinks Admanthos an
abomination of life because of his mystical and thus unnatural existance.
She is known to get along well with Selucia.
